summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of MUFE Group 4 User Research + Persona Generator application. All backend APIs (7/7) and frontend features tested successfully. Backend: 100% pass rate. Frontend: All 5 routes functional with proper navigation, form submission, data visualization, and persona generation working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API - Health Check (GET /api/health)
Backend API - Create Insight (POST /api/insights)
Backend API - Get All Insights (GET /api/insights)
Backend API - Get Insight by ID (GET /api/insights/{id})
Backend API - Get Report (GET /api/report)
Backend API - Generate Personas (POST /api/personas/generate)
Backend API - Get Personas (GET /api/personas)
Frontend - Home page loads with all navigation buttons
Frontend - Navigation to Add Insight page works
Frontend - Navigation to Report page works
Frontend - Navigation to Persona Generator page works
Frontend - Navigation to Personas page works
Frontend - Add Insight form loads with all sections (User Profile, Source Details, Products, Motivations, Pain Points, Behaviours, Channels, Purchase Intent/Influencer Effect, Qualitative Notes)
Frontend - Add Insight form submission creates insight successfully
Frontend - Add Insight form redirects to Report page after submission
Frontend - Report Dashboard displays aggregated data (Total Insights: 32, Avg Purchase Intent: 65, Avg Influencer Effect: 53)
Frontend - Report Dashboard shows all charts (Top Motivations, Top Pain Points, Age Distribution, Top Channels)
Frontend - Report Dashboard shows Top Behaviours and Products Mentioned sections
Frontend - Persona Generator page loads correctly
Frontend - Generate Personas button triggers persona generation
Frontend - Persona generation completes successfully (3 personas generated)
Frontend - Personas page displays all generated personas with complete details
Frontend - Persona cards show all required fields (name, background, demographics, motivations, pains, behaviours, channels, purchase behavior, social media influence)
End-to-End Flow - Add Insight → View Report → Generate Personas → View Personas works seamlessly
